Our Story

From Colombo to the World Stage

Web Core EX was founded on the principle that world-class digital services shouldn't break a startup's budget. Based in Colombo, Sri Lanka, we harness a deep pool of technical talent and an inherent culture of hard work to deliver projects that compete globally.

Our Journey

5 years of growth, innovation, and success

2019

The Beginning

Founded in Colombo with a vision to bridge the gap between global quality and affordable pricing for startups.

2020

First 50 Clients

Reached our first milestone of 50 happy clients across USA, UK, and Canada during a challenging year.

2021

Team Expansion

Grew our team to 25+ talented designers, developers, and marketers to serve growing demand.

2022

Global Recognition

Featured in top startup publications and won multiple awards for excellence in digital services.

2023

150+ Success Stories

Helped over 150 startups launch, scale, and secure funding with our comprehensive digital solutions.

2024

Innovation & Growth

Expanding services with AI integration, advanced analytics, and enterprise-level solutions.

To be the essential growth partner for startups worldwide. We focus on delivering high ROI through scalable technology and data-driven marketing.

Our Core Values

Excellence First

We never compromise on quality. Every project receives the same attention to detail and commitment to excellence.

Client Success

Your success is our success. We measure our achievements by the growth and satisfaction of our clients.

Innovation

We stay ahead of trends and continuously adopt cutting-edge technologies to give you a competitive edge.

Transparency

Clear communication, honest timelines, and transparent pricing. No hidden costs or surprises.

Speed & Agility

Fast turnarounds without sacrificing quality. We move at startup speed because we understand urgency.

Global Mindset

Local roots, global perspective. We understand diverse markets and cultural nuances across continents.

Why Choose Web Core EX?

Global Quality, Local Agility

We deliver Silicon Valley-level quality with the agility and cost-effectiveness of a Sri Lankan powerhouse. Best of both worlds.

  • 40-60% cost savings
  • Same quality standards
  • Faster turnaround times

24/7 Availability

We operate around the clock to align with US, UK, and European time zones, ensuring seamless communication and rapid delivery.

  • Real-time collaboration
  • Dedicated account managers
  • Quick response times

Proven Track Record

150+ successful projects, 98% client satisfaction, and countless startups funded thanks to our work.

  • Portfolio of success stories
  • Industry recognition
  • Long-term partnerships

Transparent & Trustworthy

No hidden fees, clear communication, and honest timelines. We build relationships based on trust and transparency.

  • Fixed monthly pricing
  • Regular progress updates
  • Money-back guarantee
